doc.value: ALPS profile specialized for Amazon shopping flow
Unique identifier for the product across Amazon's catalog system
Amazon Standard Identification Number used globally to identify products uniquely
Display name of the product shown to customers on listing pages
Detailed product information explaining features, specifications, and benefits to shoppers
Key product features displayed as concise bullet points on detail page
Current selling price including any active discounts or promotional offers
Original manufacturer suggested retail price before any Amazon discounts applied
Percentage savings calculated from list price to current selling price
Special pricing available exclusively for Amazon Prime members
Starting price for used or refurbished items from marketplace sellers
Indicates if product qualifies for Amazon Prime free two-day shipping
Digital coupon discount amount that can be applied at checkout
Amazon rewards points earned when purchasing with eligible credit cards
Primary product image displayed prominently on search results and detail page
Collection of product images showing different angles and use cases
Interactive 360-degree product view allowing customers to examine all angles
Demonstration video showing product features, usage, and benefits in action
Reference guide helping customers select correct size based on measurements
Current availability status indicating in stock, low stock, or out of stock
Exact number of units remaining in inventory for purchase
Notification system alerting customers when out-of-stock items become available
Expected date when out-of-stock items will be available for purchase
Indicates if product can be ordered before official release date
Scheduled launch date when new product becomes available for shipping
Available color variations for the product with inventory status
Available size options ranging from extra small to extra large
Different style variations of product such as pattern or design
Complete list of all available product variations with pricing and availability
Currently chosen combination of color, size, and style options
Product condition classification such as new, used, refurbished, or collectible
Detailed description of used item condition from marketplace seller
Unique identifier for merchant selling product through Amazon marketplace
Business or individual name of marketplace seller offering the product
Average customer rating score for marketplace seller performance
Percentage of positive feedback received from buyer transactions
Indicates if product storage, packing, and shipping handled by Amazon
Unique identifier for product manufacturer or brand in Amazon catalog
Manufacturer or brand name displayed on product listings
Unique identifier for product classification in Amazon's category hierarchy
Human-readable category name where product is classified
Full hierarchical path from root to specific product category
Navigation trail showing category hierarchy path to current product
Sales ranking position within specific product category showing popularity
Estimated delivery date based on shipping method and customer location
Shipping cost charged for product delivery to specified address
Fast free shipping option available for Amazon Prime members
Express delivery option delivering product within same calendar day
Service allowing customers to select specific delivery date and time
Unique identifier for individual customer review in Amazon system
Customer rating score from one to five stars for product
Average customer rating calculated from all product reviews
Text content of customer answer to product question
Total number of answers provided for product question
List of discount coupons currently applied to order
Unique identifier for saved shipping or billing address
Primary street address line for shipping or billing location
Secondary street address line for apartment or suite number
Reward points earned or redeemable for purchases on Amazon
Confirmed date and time when package was delivered to customer
File uploaded as attachment for customer support inquiry
Name of customer service representative handling support request
Boolean indicating if customer service agent is currently available
Amazon's final decision on return request or refund claim
Customer-provided answer to product question with helpful voting
Action to save new shipping address to account
Action to register new payment card to account
Action to apply promotional coupon code for order discount
Action to redeem gift card balance toward purchase total
Customer account management page with profile and settings
Management interface for saved shipping and billing addresses
